metadata.title: Pacific Seabird Monitoring Database

creators.name: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Alaska Biological Science Center, Biological Resources Division

metadata.description: Collate all time series data on seabird population parameters for the North Pacific and make it accessible in standard formats to management and research users.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Collate all time series data on seabird population parameters for the North Pacific and make it accessible in standard formats to management and research users.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Annually

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
